name: Europa 2022
blurb: A Heavy Rain/Telltale Games inspired Sci-Fi Adventure Game. On the first mission to Europa in search of life, your ship is sabotaged.

rewards.reward: BACKER PACK! ============================ Get access to backer updates as well as a high-def Wallpaper! Also, an MP3 of the Europa 2022 theme you heard during the trailer! Plus your name on Europa 2022's website as a backer, and my undying gratitude for backing this project!

EARLY-BIRD! ============================ You're an early backer, and for that, you deserve the game (digital download) for less as my thanks to you for putting your trust in me early! Plus all previous rewards!
GAMER! ============================ You get the game (digital download)! Plus all previous rewards!
SOUNDS! ============================ You get the original soundtrack of Europa 2022! (digital download)  Plus all previous rewards!

(DIGITAL) BACKSTORY! ============================ Comic Book PDF download! 20 color pages, original story taking place onboard the Andromeda in the 340 days leading up to the start of the game!! Includes crew member bios and concept art! Also may contain exclusive hints for the ARG! (Note: the comic will ship a few weeks/months before the release of the game.) Plus all previous rewards!

(PHYSICAL) BACKSTORY! ============================ Comic Book! 20 color pages, original story taking place onboard the Andromeda in the 340 days leading up to the start of the game!! Includes crew member bios and concept art! Also may contain exclusive hints for the ARG!  \r\n\r\nBONUS! - This tier also gets your name in the credits of the game! You will be listed in the front of the comic book, too! (Note: the comic will ship a few weeks/months before the release of the game.)  Plus all previous rewards!

LIMITED EDITION + BETA! ============================ Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE, limited edition, one-time run of the comic book, with variant special edition cover drawn by Laney Berry! (Laney is the creator of St. Christopher's School Lockdown, a gorgeous looking adventure game Kickstarted a few months ago! Her art is incredible, I'm thrilled that she is doing this cover!!) Hand numbered x/100, and signed! (On the inside cover so as to not dirty up the beautiful cover!) ========================================== BETA! ============ Be the first to set foot on Europa! Access to the Beta version means you are among the first ones to experience all that Europa has to offer! Then let me hear your feedback and help shape the game! Plus all previous rewards!

IMMERSION! ============================ Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE Special Edition flash drive containing the game, identical to the Andromeda security badges worn in-game!!  In addition, you are the first to step foot on Europa by participating in the Closed ALPHA! Once the game is feature-complete, you will be the first to test select alpha builds of the game out and give me your feedback! Help shape the game! \r\n\r\nPlus all previous (non-limited) rewards AND access to the BETA!

DESIGN A POSTER! ============================ YOU design a poster that will be onboard the ship in the bedroom of one of the crew members! Make anything you want! Your art, promote your band, do something creative/funny, anything you want! (I have final say, but I don't see there being an issue, unless you're a weird racist/sexist! Knock it off!) Plus all previous (non-limited) rewards PLUS access to the ALPHA & BETA!

BECOME A CHARACTER! ============================ Become a minor character (with collectible badge)! You play a part in one chapter of the story! The character will be named after you and resemble your likeness! You'll send me some pictures and we'll work with the artist to make the character resemble you! Your name will be mentioned in the game at least once, and your name will be on their badge, which serves as a collectible to unlock extras). Plus all previous (non-limited) rewards  PLUS access to the ALPHA & BETA!

PRODUCER ============================  You are a producer, and get access to exclusive updates and select builds of levels as they are completed, pre-alpha!  Give me your input!  Your name in the credits as Producer, with a message of your choice!  Plus all previous (non-limited) rewards!

MAIN CHARACTER & EXECUTIVE PRODUCER ============================ (NOTE: This tier includes ALL tiers below, including the LIMITED ones!!) The main character of the game shares your last name! If you have a hobby that can be taken to space, (IE. playing guitar, dancing, soccer), the main character will enjoy it as well, and we'll decorate his room as such! We put your photo in the room as a relative/friend of the main character!  ALSO: Your name in the credits as the exclusive Executive Producer, with a message of your choice!  Plus ALL previous rewards!
